abstract: Former NBA star forward Metta World Peace signs with Italian team Pallacanestro Cantu.
lead_paragraph: World Peace signed with the Italian team Pallacanestro Cantu for the remainder of the season.

headline.main: Metta World Peace to Play in Italy
headline.print_headline: World Peace to Play in Italy

snippet: World Peace signed with the Italian team Pallacanestro Cantu for the remainder of the season.
